generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a pedestrian walkway on the side of the road, separated by poles and trees, where people are walking.
- building: A multi-story building is visible on the right side of the image, with windows and a facade.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and in the background.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk, including one person in white shorts on the left.

- bus: A white bus is partially visible on the far right side of the image.
- pole: Multiple vertical poles are present, including those supporting traffic signs and a clock.
- traffic sign: A yellow traffic sign with directional arrows and text indicating "Messe Hauptbahnhof" and "Baseler Platz" is visible.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the left side of the image, near the silver car.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the left side of the image, near the silver car.
